token.tips: Pick a name for the application, and we'll give you a unique token.
token.expirydate.info: If date not specified, token validity period will be set to 24 hours by default.
token.new.warning: Token has validity period of 24 hours, please make sure you save it - you won't be able to access it again.

token.success: Your new personal access token has been created.
token.fail: An error has occurred! Personal Access token could not be created.

error.fail: An error has occurred! Profile could not be saved.
error.emailexists: Email is already in use! Please choose another one.

warning.nochanges: There is no change in the form.

firstname.minlength: Your first name is required to be at least 1 character
firstname.maxlength: Your first name cannot be longer than 50 characters

lastname.minlength: Your last name is required to be at least 1 character
lastname.maxlength: Your last name cannot be longer than 50 characters
